context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.5.1 verified. Key features: (1) Flux redesign with Logo 'Afroboost' center + Search icon right. (2) Compact 'R√©server' button (50% smaller). (3) Click behavior: single-click=pause with Play indicator, double-click=navigate to vitrine. (4) Dashboard colors section has 'Sauvegarder' button (data-testid='save-colors-btn') + auto-save indicator (data-testid='concept-save-status'). Anti-regression: Chat violet present, 'Retour au Flux' works, all March dates intact.

SINGLE_CLICK_PAUSE.behavior: Toggles isPaused state, shows Play icon overlay
SINGLE_CLICK_PAUSE.verified_by: Playwright - Play icon appeared on click, disappeared on second click

notes: Dashboard features (Sauvegarder button + auto-save indicator in colors section) require Google authentication. Verified via CODE REVIEW that implementation matches v9.5.1 requirements. All Playwright tests passed for public-facing features.
